sense.def:
The truth
so vsa dejstva o nečem, brez izmišljotin.

seg.quote: He learned the truth about Sam.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da je v izjavi ali zgodbi
truth
, mislimo, da je v celoti ali delno resnična.

seg.quote: There is an element of truth in this.
I could not deny the truth of this statement.

sense.def:
A truth
je ideja ali načelo, za katero večina ljudi misli, da je resnično.

seg.quote: It's a book that contains important truths.
